sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Destroys the sprite and frees up the memory the sprite used. It is an error to use the spriteID after the sprite has been freed.
sections.text_content: Destroys the sprite and frees up the memory the sprite used. It is an error to use the spriteID after the sprite has been freed.
sections.mdown_content: Destroys the sprite and frees up the memory the sprite used. It is an error to use the *spriteID* after the sprite has been freed.

sections.title: Example
sections.text_content: See Sprite.Animate for an example of Sprite.Free.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Sprite.Free, not by calling Free.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Sprite.Free, not by calling Free.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Sprite.Free**, not by calling **Free**.
